DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety etoricoxib compare placebo treatment postoperative pain associate total abdominal hysterectomy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study MK0663/Etoricoxib Post-Abdominal Hysterectomy Surgery Pain ( 0663-097 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old generally good health schedule total hysterectomy willing limit alcohol consumption Patient allergic study drug , cyclooxygenase2 ( COX2 ) inhibitors/nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) , ibuprofen , morphine , oxycodone hypersensitivity aspirin NSAIDS Patient uncontrolled high blood pressure Patient history drug and/or alcohol abuse within last 5 year Patient take part another investigational study within 4 week start study Patient breastfeed Patient active ulcer inflammatory bowel disease
